name: Vegetable Platformer
description:
A small platformer using premade assets from the awesome asset developer Phil Giarrusso, the assets can be found here:

https://rephil.itch.io/green-greens-forest-pixel-art-platformer-asset-pack

WASD - Move Player

Mouse 1 - Attack

Spacebar - Jump

Game is still in development and is in need of some polish.
